description._content: Hello I am a hobby photographer who is still discovering a lot about photography. In the past I mainly used to take pictures during holidays, but with the advent of digital that has changed. Among my favourite subjects are our four cats. They are wonderful subjects and they are always around. I have become very fond of my macro lens, which allows me to portray the world close-up. Flowers, bugs, butterflies, they all make wonderful subjects. I work full-time as an English teacher. Together with the housekeeping and taking care of the family, that doesn't leave that much time for shooting. My earlier pictures were taken with Olympus cameras, an E-1, an E-3 and a C-5050 compact. At the beginning of 2012 I have switched to a Canon 7D coupled with a 50mm/1.4, a 100mm/2.8 macro, a 15-85 walk-about zoom, and a 70-200 F4 / L and a Canon flash. I own the copyright to all the images in my Photostream. Do not use any of my pictures without prior permission. Please contact me if you wish to use any of my pictures in whatever kind of publication. Feel free to add me as a contact and browse my photostream. I will not automatically add you as a contact too, as I want to keep my contacts manageable. Contacts that merely send me invitations to boost their own image views will be blocked. visited 18 states (8%)Create your own visited map of The World Free counters -----///\\------Please ----///--\\\----put this ---|||----|||---on your ---|||-- -|||---profile if ---|||-- -|||---you know ----\\\--///----someone -----\\\///-----who is living with, survived ------///\-----or has passed away from -----///\\\----cancer. ----///--\\\---Thank you!
